name: Linear and Angular Momentum
latex: p = mv, \quad L = I\omega, \quad F = \frac{\Delta p}{\Delta t}
explanation: Linear momentum (p = mv) and angular momentum (L = Iω) are conserved quantities. Force equals rate of change of momentum. Momentum conservation is fundamental for analyzing collisions, impacts, and dynamic systems. Used in vehicle crash analysis, machinery dynamics, and understanding motion.
